timeline.message:
KAFKA-10048: Possible data gap for a consumer after a failover when using MM2

Ensure that the MM2 checkpoint mirror task replicates consumer offsets even when they are
zero to avoid issues with consumers after failovers.

Author: Andre Araujo <asdaraujo@gmail.com>

timeline.author: heritamas

replies.bodyText: Then, this filter matches everything, doesn't it?
replies.author: heritamas

replies.bodyText: @ryannedolan @heritamas If you guys think this is safe enough I can remove that filter. But it doesn't hurt to leave it there just in case a rogue negative offset comes through for whatever reason/bug... Please let me know what you think.
replies.author: asdaraujo

replies.bodyText: Yes, does not hurt to leave it. Just for sure.
replies.author: heritamas
